prompt: Write a fictional travel blog post about {topic}.

a luxury vacation in a tropical paradise

prompt: Write a post for a fictional personal experience blog about {topic}.

the one time you went ice skating

prompt: Write a fictional letter to {recipient} about {topic}.

instances.recipient: the hero character from a book
instances.topic: how they should defeat the villain
how much you love their music

instances.recipient: a train tycoon from the 19th century

instances.topic: how it feels to be invisible
how they can save the ocean
how they can protect their hoard
what is about to happen to them
what they should name their next ship
